meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vicki Kelly Michael Malyszko Justin Bender Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7413.

td.p: Vicki Kelly, a biologist from Newark, Delaware
Michael Malyszko, a commercial photographer from Boston, Massachusetts
Justin Bender, a technical engineer from Boulder, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $40,800)

tr.td: CURRENT POP CULTURE
16 TONS
& WHAT DO YOU "GET"
ANOTHER DAY OLDER
DEEPER IN DEBT
(Alex: And because of that, I owe my soul to...)
THE COMPANY STORE

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
